name: The Christmas Gift
description:
🎅The Christmas Gifts is a game where you have to collect 25 flashing gift boxes. But do Avoid Reindeers on your way. Can you collect the boxes??

Controls:

 Android: buttons

Pc: Left right keys to move

You can also download Android version of the game from below.

Merry Christmas, Enjoy the game!!!🎅🎅🎅
